column4: I was just thinking, someone should (or probably have) make a google bot that picks up on question phrases, does a search, and responds with a few results.
that's not really in the spirit of this channel, but if you want, discuss it in #ubuntu-ops
figured…. was just a random thought, or maybe make a trigger incase no one is around.
or….. they could just point their browser at google.com ;-)
